div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1077 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1947 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 13 AE. In one room in lower town Olbia: 10 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl.9, 10-11 [1], 13 [3], 23 [5], 26-29 [1]) Unc.: 3 AE Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
